about.title: About Kolt
about.body: Kolt is an applied AI studio from Finland. We build client solutions and our own products. Our principles: less hype, more impact; ship to production; measure everything. We work with modern stacks (Python, Node/TS), major clouds, and popular frameworks (PyTorch, TensorFlow, ONNX, OpenAI API, VLLM, Triton, LangChain, LlamaIndex) with strong attention to compliance and maintainability.
about.more: A senior, hands-on team shipping in short cycles: discovery → prototype → production. We keep scope tight, measure quality/cost/latency, and document so your team can own and operate the solution. Security, privacy, and compliance are first-class from day one.
